CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 28, 1962, pg. A3, reads: "Easter Worshippers Add Frills to Faith - St. Luke Baptist - Rev. B. S. Mason, left of open door, extends a hand and word of greeting to the faithful as they retire from the sanctuary of St. Luke Church following Eastern [Easter] morning worship services, while trio of youth, left foreground, discuss the 'essence of spring.' - All Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Women, men, and children, posed outside of St. Luke Baptist Church with sign for Rev. B. S. Mason, after Easter services
